    public class MapView
extends View
implements GridMapItemsListener, GridViewSelectionListener, TimerListener
    This class defines the view of the map.
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    作者:
    Zhe Zhao, JeanRaymondDaher, Chenglong Zhang
